about_the_game:
Enhance your experience within the Exhale XR app with this VR immersion from the Exhale wellness library.

Experience Details
Join these wild horses on their island and watch as they allow us to take part in their day to day explorations. Begin with a painted horse grazing and taking in the morning sun only a few feet from you. Next you will find yourself sitting on the mansion's steps to the ocean as you watch the majestic herd of horses graze and play. Moving to a different island of wild horses, you will find yourself in knee deep warm water coming inland from the ocean's waves as you watch the horses in the distance walk deeper into the thicket.

Purpose
Relaxation
Wildlife
Totem meditation
Equinophobia aid

Length
10:25

Specs
360° video
3840x2160
29.97fps
.mp4 file type

name: Exhale XR - Majestic Creatures

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5 2nd gen equivalent or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidea GTX 1060 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 3rd gen equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVideo GTX 2070 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
